text: just found a massive Mac OS X security hole. (removed video as a precaution)
oh dam, it didnt lock out the second display?
I reconnected the display and had full access to my desktop from the secondary screen bypassing the login screen
that was going to be my follow up... yikes

I’m trying to find their bug bounty program :crossed_fingers:

If I can reliably reproduce it and they count this in their bug bounty program. Some of that money is going to be put back in to this community via a project I’m working on. That and my house needs new windows lol.
Goal news headline - “web developer finds gaping security hole in Mac OS, uses reward money to buy windows”
